name: The Sentinel
description: A Secret Service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the President. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a Secret Service Protective Intelligence Division agent.

review.author: masonsaul
review.heading: Average action thriller
review.reviewBody: The Sentinel is an average action thriller, the plot is extremely predictable with no surprises and derivative of other action movies that have come before it. However, it's an enjoyably average action thriller due to a fast pace and really good performances from Michael Douglas and Kiefer Sutherland and enjoyable action.
